HELLO!
I'M JOHN MARK
WEB DEVELOPER

About me

I'm a software engineer specializing in both front-end and back-end development based in the Philippines.
I build web application usually with Laravel and VueJS.
My experties is in the area of responsive design but I can also do API stuffs.
I also make digital arts sometimes but my design is merly for my own hobbies.

My Skills

When I started the world of web development back in 2015, I stumbled upon this widely known framework called CodeIgniter.
I made a lot of projects using it along side with JQuery. It was pretty cool back then, but as time passed by, new php and javascript frameworks emerged. In order to keep up with the new technology trends, we need to be adaptable because that is how I believe I will grow and prosper as a Web Developer.

Laravel + Vue

Above all the php and javascript frameworks out there, this combination is my favorite.
While Laravel has its own built-in Vue js feature that is ready to be used, I like using Vue as a separate stand-alone platform.
A framework called Nuxt JS is the primary tool I use when working with VueJS as it also offer Server-Side Rendering method.
Laravel is a great tool for me for creating API's for my Vue projects as it also offer a huge variety of functions and processes built-in. Plus they have this Eloquent class which make database queries look like a child's play.
